projects.title: AutoTube
projects.description: AutoTube is an automation-based tool that simplifies YouTube content workflows by automating repetitive tasks using Python.

projects.title: Food Ordering System
projects.description: Food Ordering System is a web-based platform that enables users to browse menus, place food orders, and manage cart operations with a seamless interface.

projects.title: DevOps Python App
projects.description: DevOps Python App is an application that demonstrates DevOps practices using Python, automation, and CI/CD tooling for streamlined development and deployment.

projects.title: My Node DevOps App
projects.description: My Node DevOps App is a full-stack application demonstrating DevOps practices with Node.js, CI/CD tooling, and automated deployment workflows.

projects.title: AI Ticket Assistant
projects.description: AI Ticket Assistant is an intelligent support system that automatically categorizes and responds to help-desk tickets using natural language processing and machine learning.

projects.title: Terminal Troubleshooter
projects.description: Terminal Troubleshooter is a command-line utility that helps users diagnose and fix common terminal and system errors using guided steps and automated suggestions.

projects.title: Pariksha
projects.description: Pariksha is an online examination system designed to facilitate the creation, management, and evaluation of tests with ease.

projects.title: Sentiment-Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment-Analysis is a web-based application that analyzes user-provided text and determines its sentiment using machine learning techniques.

projects.title: ML-SandBox
projects.description: ML-SandBox is an interactive web-based application designed for performing machine learning tasks on user-uploaded datasets.

projects.title: BugBuster
projects.description: A beginner-friendly tool that helps new contributors find open-source issues they can easily tackle.

projects.title: EduKestra
projects.description: EduKestra is an educational platform designed to provide interactive learning tools, courses, and resources through a web-based interface.
